verses.verse: There was a man<WH376> in the land<WH776> of Uz,<WH5780> whose name<WH8034> was Job.<WH347> That man<WH376> was blameless and upright,<WH3477> and one<WH376> who feared<WH3373> God,<WH430> and turned<WH5493> away from evil.<WH7451>
There were born<WH3205> to him seven<WH7651> sons<WH1121> and three<WH7969> daughters.<WH1323>

His possessions<WH4735> also were seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> sheep,<WH6629> three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> camels,<WH1581> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> yoke<WH6776> of oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> female donkeys,<WH860> and a very<WH3966> great<WH7227> household;<WH5657> so that this man<WH376> was the greatest<WH7227> of all the children<WH1121> of the east.<WH6924>

His sons<WH1121> went<WH1980> and held a feast<WH4960> in the house of each<WH376> one<WH376> on his birthday;<WH3117> and they sent<WH7971> and called<WH7121> for their three<WH7969> sisters<WH269> to eat<WH398> and to drink with them.<WH8354>

It was so,<WH3117> when the days of their feasting<WH4960> had run their course,<WH5362> that Job<WH347> sent<WH7971> and sanctified<WH6942> them,<WH7925> and rose up early in the morning,<WH1242> and offered<WH5927> burnt offerings<WH5930> according to the number<WH4557> of them all.<WH347> For Job said,<WH559> "It may be<WH194> that my sons<WH1121> have sinned,<WH2398> and renounced<WH1288> God<WH430> in their hearts.<WH3824>" Job<WH347> did<WH6213> this continually.<WH3117>
Now it happened on the day<WH3117> when God<WH430>'s sons<WH1121> came<WH935> to present<WH3320> themselves before Yahweh,<WH3068> that Satan<WH7854> also came<WH935> among them.<WH8432>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Satan,<WH7854> "Where<WH370> have you come<WH935> from?<WH7854>" Then Satan answered<WH6030> Yahweh,<WH3068> and said,<WH559> "From going back and forth<WH7751> in the earth,<WH776> and from walking up and down in it.<WH1980>"

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Satan,<WH7854> "Have you considered<WH7760> my servant,<WH5650> Job?<WH347> For there is none like him in the earth,<WH776> a blameless<WH8535> and an upright<WH3477> man,<WH376> one<WH376> who fears<WH3373> God,<WH430> and turns away from evil.<WH7451>"
Then Satan<WH7854> answered<WH6030> Yahweh,<WH3068> and said,<WH559> "Does Job<WH347> fear<WH3372> God<WH430> for nothing?<WH2600>

Haven't<WH7753> you made a hedge around him,<WH1157> and around his house,<WH1004> and around all that he has,<WH5439> on every side? You have blessed<WH1288> the work<WH4639> of his hands,<WH3027> and his substance<WH4735> is increased<WH6555> in the land.<WH776>
But<WH199> put forth<WH7971> your hand<WH3027> now,<WH5060> and touch all that he has,<WH1288> and he will renounce you to your face.<WH6440>"

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Satan,<WH7854> "Behold,<WH3027> all that he has is in your power. Only on himself don't<WH7971> put forth your hand.<WH3027>" So Satan<WH7854> went forth<WH7971> from the presence<WH6440> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
It fell on a day<WH3117> when his sons<WH1121> and his daughters<WH1323> were eating<WH398> and drinking<WH8354> wine<WH3196> in their eldest<WH1060> brother<WH251>'s house,<WH1004>
that there came<WH935> a messenger<WH4397> to Job,<WH347> and said,<WH559> "The oxen<WH1241> were plowing,<WH2790> and the donkeys<WH860> feeding<WH7462> beside them,<WH3027>

and the Sabeans<WH7614> attacked,<WH5307> and took them away.<WH3947> Yes,<WH5221> they have killed the servants<WH5288> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and I alone have escaped<WH4422> to tell you.<WH5046>"

While he was still speaking,<WH1696> there also came<WH935> another,<WH559> and said, "The fire<WH784> of God<WH430> has fallen<WH5307> from the sky,<WH8064> and has burned up<WH1197> the sheep<WH6629> and the servants,<WH5288> and consumed<WH398> them,<WH4422> and I alone have escaped to tell you.<WH5046>"

While he was still speaking,<WH1696> there came<WH935> also another,<WH559> and said, "The Chaldeans<WH3778> made<WH7760> three<WH7969> bands,<WH7218> and swept<WH6584> down on the camels,<WH1581> and have taken them away,<WH3947> yes,<WH5221> and killed the servants<WH5288> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword;<WH2719> and I alone have escaped<WH4422> to tell you.<WH5046>"

While he was still speaking,<WH1696> there came<WH935> also another,<WH559> and said, "Your sons<WH1121> and your daughters<WH1323> were eating<WH398> and drinking<WH8354> wine<WH3196> in their eldest<WH1060> brother<WH251>'s house,<WH1004>

and behold,<WH935> there came a great<WH1419> wind<WH7307> from<WH5676> the wilderness,<WH4057> and struck<WH5060> the four<WH702> corners<WH6438> of the house,<WH1004> and it fell<WH5307> on the young men,<WH5288> and they are dead.<WH4191> I alone have escaped<WH4422> to tell you.<WH5046>"
Then Job<WH347> arose,<WH6965> and tore<WH7167> his robe,<WH4598> and shaved<WH1494> his head,<WH7218> and fell down<WH5307> on the ground,<WH776> and worshiped.<WH7812>

He said,<WH559> "Naked<WH6174> I came out<WH3318> of my mother<WH517>'s womb,<WH990> and naked<WH6174> shall I return<WH7725> there.<WH3068> Yahweh gave,<WH5414> and Yahweh<WH3068> has taken away.<WH3947> Blessed<WH1288> be the name<WH8034> of Yahweh.<WH3068>"
In all this,<WH347> Job did not sin,<WH2398> nor charge<WH5414> God<WH430> with wrongdoing.<WH8604>
